name: 5 Days at Mom's
description:
5 Days at Mom's is a game that captures the duality of needing to work, but wanting to have fun. Complete tasks as they appear, and use your downtime to play some video-games.

How to Play:
  • A & D - Walk
  • Space - Interact

To keep the game bar from emptying you need to play games; to keep the mom bar from filling you need to complete the various tasks as they become available. If you manage to keep these two things from happening you win.

Credits:
  • Fábio Sousa: programming; game design
  • Iara Dusk: art
  • Nuno Ramos: programming; game design; sound & music
  • Sofia Ribeiro: art

Made by members of GameDev Técnico, a youth association from Portugal where university students come together to make videogames.
